name: Escape Route Great Confusion Free Edition
name_original: Escape Route Great Confusion Free Edition
description:
Let's make a way in the block and let everyone escape from the black hole!

-----------------------------------------------------
物理エンジンで動くブロックで道を作りブラックホールから全員を逃がそう！
-----------------------------------------------------
-How to play-

Mouse & keyborad

Left click:Block installation
right click:Delete block
Mouse Wheel/up/down:Block rotation
Mouse wheel button:Return angle

The number of blocks that can be placed on the stage is fixed.
